mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo_order (user_id, identity_type, photos, delivery_id, is_owner_receiving, remark, customer_id, status, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{identityType}, #{photos}, #{deliveryId}, #{isOwnerReceiving}, #{remark}, #{customerId}, #{status}, #{createTime});
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.photos, p.create_time, p.status, p.remark, d.receiver deliveryName, d.receiver_phone deliveryPhone, CONCAT_WS('',d.delivery_city,d.delivery_county, d.delivery_street,d.residence_name,d.detailed_address,p.is_owner_receiving) detailedAddress FROM photo_order p LEFT JOIN delivery_address d ON d.id = p.delivery_id WHERE p.id = #{id}
